page.title: 12Population-Cefn Hengoed:cont
page.content: {Age groups.} As a whole there are 26% of people who have lived in the village for over 50 years,23% in the 21 to 50 age group and 11% in the 0 to 5 year age group. Almost without exception the people who have moved into the village have come from the surrounding area,within a 15 mile radius. The new estate has the highest proportion of children,particulary the under 4 age group,and no-one over the age of 60,whereas the other areas have a more even spread between the age groups. The first 5 rows of houses were built for miners families.Later,people were allocated council accomodation or moved into the area for employment. There is some movement out of the village usually due to a change of council house or job.
